channel.title: Podverse - Test Feed
channel.description: This RSS feed exists just for testing Podcasting 2.0 namespaces in Podverse.

item.title: Podcasting 2.0 Dev Meeting for May 28 2022
item.description: Just a quick marker... Three of us had a chat but this is just the end of that.
item.content:encoded: Just a quick marker... Three of us had a chat but this is just the end of that.
item.dc:creator: Brian of London

item.title: Test Episode 4
item.description: Vivamus sed rutrum elit, eu porttitor eros. In viverra dui at nibh convallis, vitae tincidunt enim lobortis. Maecenas vel finibus dui. Donec et iaculis lectus, sit amet efficitur neque. Mauris sagittis in dolor id ultrices. Proin in tempor dui, ut auctor sapien.

item.title: Test Episode 3
item.description: Nunc in tempor odio. Fusce vehicula ultrices velit sit amet vehicula. Ut ultrices pretium placerat. Quisque quis sapien ultrices, laoreet odio at, bibendum metus. Nulla vel eros pharetra tortor rhoncus dignissim. Sed semper turpis sed mauris vehicula, non sollicitudin libero congue. Phasellus faucibus venenatis lacus vitae posuere. Etiam varius viverra dignissim. Donec convallis lacus arcu, at ultrices est feugiat quis.
